label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_026
content:
## 2026-01-28 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: 17ms p95: 41.9ms p99: N/A | err: 0.08% (17 errors) | success: 99.92%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | axfr: 25 (axfr success: 98.7%) | ixfr: 198 (ixfr success: 99.2%) | transfer_avg_ms: 540 | transfer_p95_ms: 1280 | tsig_failures: 0
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS req | records_changed: 28 | zones_touched: 5 | ttl_min_s: 300 | ttl_max_s: 43200 | ttl_median_s: 3600 | rollbacks: 0
- /health-check: REQUESTS req | authoritative_reachability_pct: 99.99% | soa_serial_mismatch_count: 0 | lame_delegation_count: 0
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS req | zones_signed: 92 | signature_refreshes: 123 | signing_queue_depth: 1 | ds_mismatch_count: 0 | bogus_validation_events: 1
- /change-request: REQUESTS req | change_requests: 4 | changes_applied: 4 | changes_failed: 0 | mean_time_to_apply_min: 18

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 28% | Mem 62% | Disk 80% | Conns: N/A | Net: 82/114 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 21% | Mem 49% | Disk 59% | Conns: N/A | Net: 61/77 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 48% | Mem 68% | Disk 56% | Conns: N/A | Net: 100/142 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 32% | Mem 73% | Disk 66% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/21 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 66%

### Connection Pools
- pool-name: active N | idle N | waiting N | exhaustion: N | max: N | avg_wait: Xms
- (No specific pool data provided)

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.6% | Bandwidth: 1.4 Gbps | Origin requests: 25200

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC bogus validation event on zone: 1
- [INFO] Propagation to 36 cloud edge sites completed in average 67s, p95: 162s
- [INFO] TTL changes applied to 5 zones, 28 records changed, min TTL: 300s, max TTL: 43200s, median TTL: 3600s
- [INFO] Zone transfer requests: AXFR 25 (98.7% success), IXFR 198 (99.2% success), avg transfer time: 540ms, p95: 1280ms
- [INFO] DNS queries peak at 65,000 QPS, average 25,200 QPS; NXDomain: 2.2%, SERVFAIL: 0.06%; UDP: 96.8%, TCP fallback: 1.2%
- [INFO] DNSSEC zones signed: 92; signature refreshes: 123; queue depth: 1; no DS mismatches; 1 bogus validation event
- [INFO] Health checks: authoritative reachability 99.99%, no SOA mismatch, no lame delegations
- [INFO] Change requests: 4, all applied successfully, average apply time: 18 min

### Events
- Enabled prefetch coverage to 86% after adding two resolver POPs; monitored for upstream query spikes; none observed.
- Performed routine DNSSEC signature refresh verification; RRSIG expiration lead time maintained within policy.
- Reviewed and pruned unused TSIG keys; removed 6 retired keys; updated access lists.
- Ran quarterly zone transfer test suite; confirmed AXFR/IXFR behavior and transfer ACLs across cloud endpoints.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: J. Reed. 0 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Normal; hygiene tasks completed and prefetch coverage expanded.
